name: Bee My Hero
description:
This game was created for the "Just RTP  Game Jam".

Plot

Lack of water and unhealthy air have dried up the earth and the bees are preparing to leave their beloved wood forever. 

However a brave worker bee doesn't want to give up and hopes in his heart to be able to find a remedy. 

But how can a little bee save an entire wood from death? It seems impossible, but at his side, he'll find the Fairy of the Wood and the Spirits of Nature, which will give him their great powers.

Features
  • 4 Powers of Nature ( Water, Fire, Earth and Wind) to  make your way and solve puzzles!  
  • 5 different zones to explore.
  • 1+ hours of gameplay.
  • Don't worry if you get stuck, the Fairy of the Wood is  always ready to lend a hand!
